Package com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.reflection.chain

Reflection chaining is multiple reflective operations dependant on the result of the last in order to get the final result.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConstructLink
    Weak access to the reflection link to create objects through the constructor access
    ConstructLink.Creator
    The creation access for the constructor
    FieldLink
    Represents a field link in the ReflectionChain
    FieldLink.Getter
    The field getter access
    FieldLink.Setter
    The field setter access
    MethodLink
    Represents the method invocation link in the reflection chain
    MethodLink.Invoker
    Invokes the method and returns the next link builder
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstructLinkImpl
    Implementation for ConstructLink.
    FieldLinkImpl
    Implementation of FieldLink.
    MethodLinkImpl
    Implementation of MethodLink, see description of the implemented interfaces.
    ReflectionChain
    The base builder for the reflection chain

Package com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.reflection.chain Description

Reflection chaining is multiple reflective operations dependant on the result of the last in order to get the final result.

This is simply a big wrapper over com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.reflection.
